Name: ViewRoles
Description: This permission gives access to view roles for an office.

Name: UpdateRole
Description: This permission gives access to add/update a custom role for an office.

Name: DeleteRole
Description: This permission gives access to delete a custom role for an office.

Name: ViewUsers
Description: This permission gives access to view users for an office.

Name: UpdateUser
Description: This permission gives access to add/update a user for an office.

Name: DeleteUser
Description: This permission gives access to delete a user for an office.

Name: ViewSuperAdminUsers
Description: This permission gives access to view SuperAdmin users.

Name: UpdateSuperAdminUsers
Description: This permission gives access to create/update SuperAdmin users.

Name: DeleteSuperAdminUsers
Description: This permission gives access to delete SuperAdmin users.

Name: ViewOffices
Description: This permission gives access to view offices and office information.

Name: UpdateOffice
Description: This permission gives access to add/update office information.

Name: DeleteOffice
Description: This permission gives access to delete an office.

Name: ViewOfficeBankAccount
Description: This permission gives access to view bank account information for an office.

Name: UpdateOfficeBankAccount
Description: This permission gives access to add/update bank account information for an office.

Name: DeleteOfficeBankAccount
Description: This permission gives access to delete bank account information for an office.

Name: ViewOfficeOwner
Description: This permission gives access to view owner information for an office.

Name: UpdateOfficeOwner
Description: This permission gives access to add/update owner information for an office.

Name: DeleteOfficeOwner
Description: This permission gives access to delete owner information for an office.

Name: ViewOfficeFiles
Description: This permission gives access to view files for an office.

Name: UploadOfficeFiles
Description: This permission gives access to upload files for an office.

Name: DeleteOfficeFiles
Description: This permission gives access to delete files for an office.

Name: ViewOfficeLenders
Description: This permission gives access to view lenders for an office.

Name: UpdateOfficeLenders
Description: This permission gives access to update lenders for an office.

Name: ViewLoanApps
Description: This permission gives access to view loan applications.

Name: SubmitLoanApp
Description: This permission gives access to submit a loan application to a lender.

Name: UpdateLoanApp
Description: This permission gives access to update a loan application.

Name: ArchiveLoanApp
Description: This permission gives access to archive a loan application.

Name: ViewLoans
Description: This permission gives access to view loans.

Name: UpdateLoan
Description: This permission gives access to update loan information.

Name: ArchiveLoan
Description: This permission gives access to archive a loan.

Name: ViewFunding
Description: This permission gives access to view loan funding information.

Name: ViewRefunds
Description: This permission gives access to view refund information.

Name: SubmitRefund
Description: This permission gives access to submit refund requests.

Name: UpdateThread
Description: This permission allows users to archive message threads.

Name: ViewMessages
Description: This permission allows users to view messages.

Name: UpdateMessage
Description: This permission allows users to create, edit, and delete their own messages.

Name: DeleteMessage
Description: This permission allows users to delete all messages for their office.

Name: EnrollFunding
Description: This permission allows users to enroll an office with the funding service.

Name: FundOffices
Description: This permission allows users to fund office transactions.
